channel.title: Comments on: Refugees Welcome: Local Interventions for an EU Dilemma
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: Liz
item.dc:creator: Liz
item.description:
Hi Kelly,
Great article. I'm moving to NRW soon and I'm wondering if you have any contacts in the Detmold area who work with asylum seekers/refugees? Can you pls email details if you have some? Thank you for this.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Kelly,

Great article. I’m moving to NRW soon and I’m wondering if you have any contacts in the Detmold area who work with asylum seekers/refugees? Can you pls email details if you have some?
Thank you for this.

item.title: By: Paris Lensky
item.dc:creator: Paris Lensky
item.description:
Hallo Kelly!
I recently arrived in Berlin, two weeks ago to shoot a documentary on the Refugee Crisis from Australia. I found this article really helpful in detailing the plans of volunteers, links to their websites and the overview of the whole situation. Thank you for writing this!
Paris
item.content:encoded:
Hallo Kelly!

I recently arrived in Berlin, two weeks ago to shoot a documentary on the Refugee Crisis from Australia. I found this article really helpful in detailing the plans of volunteers, links to their websites and the overview of the whole situation. Thank you for writing this!

Paris

item.description: hallo kelly, am very proud to know you.this is a wonderful comprehensive article and very well written haymo,(sophias opa
